message: Let's start fair. I'll take the majority, but I'm leaving you a decent share.  Accept and we can both walk away with something.
My turn.  This split is more reflective of the fact we'll both walk away with nothing if we can't make a deal.  Let's be sensible.
Okay, let's compromise. I'm willing to lower my share, but I need to get a bigger piece of the pie than you offered. We still have time, but we need to start agreeing.
Time is running out and this is getting us nowhere.  Meet me in the middle and we can both profit from this.
